Description: On Rt. 653 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Reams Rd; Rt. 647E/W (Chesterfield County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-77 at mile marker 6.3 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer
